body:
Error: Could not find or load main class net.minecraft.client.main.Main


I only speak English. Someone, please, tell me how to fix this :(
body_tagged:

title: Minecraft won't launch.

replies.body:
Go to minecraft.net.
Log in.
Download it again.
Run it.
Boom.
replies.body_tagged:
Go to minecraft.net.
Log in.
Download it again.
Run it.
Boom.

replies.body: Are you using a modded client?  If not, then just follow Diamond's steps and delete the other file.
replies.body_tagged: Are you using a modded client?  If not, then just follow Diamond's steps and delete the other file.

reply_to.body: Are you using a modded client?  If not, then just follow Diamond's steps and delete the other file.
reply_to.body_tagged: Are you using a modded client?  If not, then just follow Diamond's steps and delete the other file.

replies.body: Yeah, but sometimes no matter how many times you install minecraft it doesn't work (at least in my experience). So I don't this will work, but it does depend on your computer.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, but sometimes no matter how many times you install minecraft it doesn't work (at least in my experience). So I don't this will work, but it does depend on your computer.

replies.body: Sounds like you should reinstall minecraft.
replies.body_tagged: Sounds like you should reinstall minecraft.

replies.body: Delete your versions folder and run the launcher again.
replies.body_tagged: Delete your versions folder and run the launcher again.

replies.body: Why would you need to add that you only speak Engish?
replies.body_tagged: Why would you need to add that you only speak Engish?

replies.body: Could you send the crash log by pasting it into a pastebin? That'll help greatly into investigating what the exact problem is.
replies.body_tagged: Could you send the crash log by pasting it into a pastebin? That'll help greatly into investigating what the exact problem is.

replies.body:
Thanks guys, I fixed it.

I was trying to imply that I didn't understand the error messages.
